entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then snow or freezing rain changing to rain in the afternoon. Fog patches late in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then northeast 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 06 March 2023
